title: SSEC
subtitle: Space Science and Engineering Center
description: Focused on projects to help increase productivity and the overall experience in the data center.
Developed software and webpages for data visualization, satellite imagery, and 3D interactive displays.
Created projects to help process satellite data, automate quality checks, and monitor live data feeds.
Worked on several projects outside of the data center including the visualization of the Japanese Venus Orbiter Akatsuki and the EarthNow Quarterly Climate Digest.
